answerText: Tierra del Fuego[10] This channel separates the main island of Tierra del Fuego from the southern islands of Navarino and Hoste. A dispute over the islands of Picton, Nueva, and the Lennox Islands in this channel nearly led to a 1978 war between Chile and Argentina.
heading: NASAT  |2014 | 11 | 8 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: The petroleum at Manantiales on this archipelago is the only oil field in Chile. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this archipelago located just south of the mainland of South America.
